adb5c681-8849-4c15-8f87-bc8c7f29b5ff.title: Bartender
adb5c681-8849-4c15-8f87-bc8c7f29b5ff.text: What can I do yer for?

options.text: A glass of your finest ale please.
Can you recommend where an adventurer might make his fortune?
Do you know where I can get some good equipment?

da2e545f-d8f4-470a-841c-0435366be9ab.title: <player>
da2e545f-d8f4-470a-841c-0435366be9ab.text:
Can you recommend where an adventurer might make
his fortune?

7fbb7a43-608b-42ef-ba33-1f35cb333bdf.title: Bartender
7fbb7a43-608b-42ef-ba33-1f35cb333bdf.text:
Ooh I don't know if I should be giving away
information, makes the game too easy.

options.text: Game? What are you talking about?

c7e1f5e2-e6a8-4cda-9806-ddaa2dc05e43.title: <player>
c7e1f5e2-e6a8-4cda-9806-ddaa2dc05e43.text: Game? What are you talking about?

d9fb7dc1-315c-4dcb-a9ea-b7075494b2c3.title: Bartender
d9fb7dc1-315c-4dcb-a9ea-b7075494b2c3.text:
This world around us... is an online game... called 
MineScape.

8181f021-3a26-4058-bad2-521d54a6947a.title: <player>
8181f021-3a26-4058-bad2-521d54a6947a.text:
Nope, still don't understand what you are talking about.
What does 'online' mean?

3864616f-07c7-4ebe-ae61-f52af513c39a.title: Bartender
3864616f-07c7-4ebe-ae61-f52af513c39a.text:
It's a sort of connection between magic boxes across
the world, big boxes on people's desktops and little ones
people can carry. They can talk to each other to play
games.

b88f0f98-9487-464f-b5ca-03ec9cf3f696.title: <player>
b88f0f98-9487-464f-b5ca-03ec9cf3f696.text: I give up. You're obviously completely mad!

95e5ff55-a8be-4737-960e-303e0ea2f20f.title: Bartender
95e5ff55-a8be-4737-960e-303e0ea2f20f.text:
Go and talk to the bartender at the Jolly Boar Inn, he
doesn't seem to mind giving away clues.

e12e0d04-b43f-422c-bfc9-eb0d72ff6518.title: <player>
e12e0d04-b43f-422c-bfc9-eb0d72ff6518.text: A glass of your finest ale please.

2045a6d4-68c4-43c9-b082-7d2ee2b1f852.title: <player>
2045a6d4-68c4-43c9-b082-7d2ee2b1f852.text: Oh dear. I don't seem to have enough money.

16bdc8d5-b351-4a35-a5f1-918c707a75d6.title: <player>
16bdc8d5-b351-4a35-a5f1-918c707a75d6.text: Do you know where I can get some good equipment?

9160d81c-7b84-4cc4-aca6-f343fa7fade9.title: Bartender
9160d81c-7b84-4cc4-aca6-f343fa7fade9.text:
Well, there's the sword shop across the road, or there's
also all sorts of shops up around the market.
